question: What is Bulkwize?
answer:
Bulkwize is a B2B ecommerce platform which provides live B2C kind of ecommerce experience for your business' bulk buying needs.

With the bulkwize mobile app you can find products for all your business needs and buy them online in bulk.

Our pan India Supplier connect, enables us to provide you the widest range of products at the best possible price (volume discounts). This is the only platform where you get access to thousands of products across various categories, order them at your convenience and we will deliver them to your doorstep.

question: How do I access your platform?
answer: From any browser (mobile, tablet, desktop) just click http://bulkwize.com/website/index.html

question: Where do I download your mobile app?
answer:
Launching in 15 days, once launched you can, From your mobile device, click here and follow the instructions. It will not take more that couple of seconds to get you started.

Alternatively, Go to the play store, search for “bulkwize” and look for the logo

Note: We currently support android based devices only

question: What is the bulkwize advantage for a supplier?
answer:
Bulkwize will be a way to bring your brand in line with the new age digital m-commerce, allowing for further innovations in demand predictability.

It is a powerful medium with high reach enabling direct sales to both retailers and institutional buyers across India, reducing your dependence on Distribution Network. This direct connect will allow to market the bulk buy offers effectively and efficiently resulting in higher sales and margins.

question: How do I promote an offer on my product?
answer:
There are multiple ways an offer will be displayed to the buyer

  • Bulkwize home-page will display the top 5 selected offers on the large hero image
  • The offers section of the app will list all the offers
  • Brand listing page will have the details of the offer with larger quality discounts
  • We will send instant notification to buyers about the offers through our mobile platform

question: As a supplier, will managing products, inventory & delivery be a lot of online work for me?
answer: We provide comprehensive support for suppliers with minimal / no work required from them on daily basis. Please contact our supplier relationship team here to get more details.

question: What is the bulkwize advantage for a buyer?
answer:
If you are running a business, bulkwize will provide you opportunity to earn great margins with just a click. Bulkwize will be one-stop shop for all your daily business needs. Here are some of the advantages

  • Time Saving with orders delivered at your business address and convenience of ordering anytime with no impact to your business
  • A wide assortment of guaranteed original brands
  • Best price gurantee and no longer need to get into tedious discussions with suppliers
  • Transparency in prices with best discounts for your bulk buying needs.
  • Great shopping experience with an easy to find products app layout and a friendly customer service to help you of need any help

question: What is bulkwize best rate guarantee?
answer: Our motto is to bring the best possible bulk buy rates to the retailers. In case you find better rate than us elsewhere, please contact us with details of your cheaper purchase and we will communicate to our pricing team. Kindly note the maximum different in two purchases should not be over 4 hours.

question: What payment modes are supported?
answer: We currently only support Cash-on-delivery. We will soon be adding other mobile friendly payment modes like paytm and paypal.

question: How do I register?
answer:
Registrations is an easy three step process

  • Fill the registration form on the app
  • Bulkwize team will contact you to get your photo ID, business license and copy of a bill and post verification, will send you a welcome mail
  • Please follow the activation link on the welcome mail to complete your registration

question: What documents are required for registration?
answer:
• Any of the following documents accepted as photo id proof:
    • Aadhar card
    • Driving license
    • Passport
    • Voter Id card
  • Any of the following documents are accepted as registered business proof:
    • Valid business license issued by Central or State Government
    • Copy of outward sales invoice or company letterhead to be submitted along with business license
    • Authorization letter in case primary member is not a license holder
  • Validity of membership
    • Membership is valid till the expiry of the business license provided
    • For licenses that do not have defined validity, membership is valid for 5 years from the date of registration
    • Post expiry of the membership, a member can’t purchase from the store, unless the renewed valid license document is submitted and expiry extended on the system (member needs to submit a copy of recent outward invoice for renewal, in case of licenses with no defined validity)
    • Membership is terminated in case any of the submitted documents is found invalid

question: I could not find the product I am looking for?
answer:
You can use the catalogues filter to narrow down the product or use the search feature.

We are constantly trying to expand our inventory, please contact us for any thing that would like to get added in the Bulkwize platform.

question: Can I place the orders for goods not available?
answer: Only available products can be ordered. The app in future will have options to add products to your wish-list and mark them for notifications.

question: Do you deliver at my place?
answer: Yes, we do. We organize delivery all goods purchased through our platform. We have regular scheduled deliveries within all prominent areas of Bangalore. Please contact customer service if you want our products outside these areas.

question: What should I do if my order is bigger than the maximum quantity listed on the page?
answer: Please contact customer service for any upward customization to your orders.

question: What should I do if my order is smaller than the minimum quantity listed on the page?
answer: This is a bulk-buy app and the minimum quantities are strictly enforced. However send us your suggestions to our customer service

question: How frequently can I order?
answer: You can place the order whenever you want, however our delivery days are fixed for each areas. Our delivery time is generally 5-6 working days, however once you order with us, we will send you a confirmation email with tentative delivery schedules.

question: Can I change my order? What if the goods delivered do not meet my expectations?
answer:
Yes you can change the order before the cutoff time (Please refer the order confirmation email to check cutoff-time).

Quality is our utmost motto! So if the goods received by you are damaged or not in good condition, please contact our customer care and we will take this up very strongly with the supplier for appropriate next steps.

question: Will the information I provide be safe?
answer: Yes, we promise to use the information provided, only for verification or direct business with bulkwize. We will never provide information collected without your consent to any other third party. Our site is completely secure with latest safety featured implemented to protect personal information.

question: My question is not listed here? What should I do?
answer: Please contact our customer relationship team here and we will be happy to answer your queries.
